item.title: NYC trash bins availability
item.description: To finally try my hands on map visualisations, I used this publicly available dataset from NYC Open Data Data is very nice and tidy so it actually took less than an hour to create a simlpe (interactive when not PNG) plot using Leaflet: This is using the following libraries: lettercase (has a neat substitution for make.names but uses underscores instead!) tidyverse leaflet mapview webshot htmlwidgets htmltools magrittr
